Articles.Content: Anyone know how far we are into the Four week trial im confised with 0.15.1 and 0.15.2
4 weeks until a whole new version is released (0.16) I think we\'re about half way in.

4 weeks until a whole new version is released (0.16) I think we\'re about half way in.

Erm, no. 4 week development cycle. IE they develop for 4 weeks, and then they take the time they need to beta test.

You can see from HarvesteR\'s post here that all their deadlines will be kept internal from now on, so it\'s not likely that the 4 week cycle will be kept, basically it\'ll be ready when the Development team are happy with it.

You can see from HarvesteR\'s post here that all their deadlines will be kept internal from now on, so it\'s not likely that the 4 week cycle will be kept, basically it\'ll be ready when the Development team are happy with it.

Great! I like the new style where all of the team members post updates. It makes me feel like things are happening.
